name: Startup Forums
description: Discussions and news from startup communities.
selectionPrompt: Pick threads with real experience (metrics, screenshots, growth curves) or credible resources. Prefer many substantive comments; skip advice‑only and venting.
essencePrompt: Discussion synthesis: context, winning tactic (metric), strongest counterpoint, and a small test to run. 80–120 words.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑liners using comments when possible: 1) Founder — lesson, 2) Operator — pitfall, 3) Investor — signal/risk. If none: 'No meaningful perspectives found.'
